description.zh-cn: 中国外科学家，中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军总后勤部卫生部副部长。
description.en: Chinese surgeon, a major general in the People's Liberation Army, and former Deputy Director of the Health Department of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省南阳市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Nanyang City, Henan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部卫生部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部卫生部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的部门，负责全军卫生工作。
description.en: A former department of the People's Liberation Army responsible for the health work of the entire military.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

description.en: Fang Guo'en is from Fangcheng, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 方国恩拥有中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: Fang Guo'en holds the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部卫生部

description.zh-cn: 方国恩曾任中国人民解放军总后勤部卫生部副部长。
description.en: Fang Guo'en formerly served as the Deputy Director of the Health Department of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，方国恩担任药典委员会副主任委员。
description.en: According to category information, Fang Guo'en serves as the Vice Chairman of the Pharmacopoeia Commission.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，方国恩担任中国药学会常务理事，并被列入第二十三届理事会名单。
description.en: According to category information, Fang Guo'en serves as an Executive Director of the Chinese Pharmaceutical Association and is listed in the 23rd Council.

position.zh-cn: 第九届全国委员会委员

description.zh-cn: 根据导航模板，方国恩是中国科学技术协会第九届全国委员会的成员。
description.en: According to the navigation template, Fang Guo'en is a member of the 9th National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，方国恩是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Fang Guo'en is a member of the Communist Party of China.
